text: Halli nangni innasurra khat-um katar ngai chongtanna inna innaruoi phakhan, angme ningrilsik tia ningmalung minpoong maru; apha heitung phakhan, nangni diangnga napeii chongkha rilru, chongngai kha nangnichong enuni takkha Ratha Inthiang diang makheiya akajuo kha eii. Matt 1:17-20; Luk 12:11,12
